title: Is IIT the best educational institution of the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, not at all. There are so many institutes in the world that are way much more better than IITs.  Moreover, If you are admitted in a IIT, and are persistently scoring low grades and barely managing to pass, will any company be willing to offer you jobs? On the other hand, If you may not graduate from a well-reputed college but an average college supposedly with good grades and persistent performance, during the time of interviews you will have a much more better chance to qualify. The above, surely proves one thing clearly that your job and career is regardless of the college you have graduated from. I am not ocmpletely denying the worth of the name of the college, but at the end of the day,  it's your performance that matters. If you find my answer useful, please check out my blog at The Stories of My Life.
